com.github.wuic.engine
Interface LineInspector

All Known Implementing Classes:
CGCssUrlLineInspector
public interface LineInspector

Represents an object providing replacement functionality inside a line for a group of character matching a particular pattern.

Since:
0.3.3
Version:
1.3
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Method Summary
 List<Nut> appendTransformation(Matcher matcher, StringBuilder replacement, EngineRequest request, NutsHeap heap, Nut originalNut)
           Computes the replacement to be made inside the text for the given Matcher which its find() method as just been called.
 Pattern getPattern()
           Gets the pattern to find text to be replaced inside the lines.
 

Method Detail

getPattern

Pattern getPattern()

Gets the pattern to find text to be replaced inside the lines.

Returns:
the pattern to use

appendTransformation

List<Nut> appendTransformation(Matcher matcher,
                               StringBuilder replacement,
                               EngineRequest request,
                               NutsHeap heap,
                               Nut originalNut)
                               throws WuicException

Computes the replacement to be made inside the text for the given Matcher which its find() method as just been called.

Parameters:
matcher - the matcher which provides found text thanks to its group() method.
replacement - the text which will replace the matching text
request - the request that orders this transformation
heap - use when we need to create nut
originalNut - the original nut
Returns:
the nut that was referenced in the matching text, null if the inspector did not perform any change
Throws:
WuicException - if an exception occurs
